lead_paragraph: The successful occupation of the Gilbert group of islands in the Central Pacific represents a tactical action of which Americans have every right to be proud. Aware of the heavy cost of amphibious warfare, the American command showed high wisdom in amassing a terrific preponderance of force.
abstract: Articles on current and post-war aviation
